title: 1st Floor 2bdr apartment in Baker Neighborhood
posting_body: Entire first floor apartment in Historic Victorian in Baker Neighborhood, 2 blocks from South Broadways shops.
New wood floors, living room leads into open large kitchen with dishwasher and new stainless fridge.
Original pocket doors if desired to close off living room.
Larger bedroom with ample closets and smaller second bedroom or office.
Bathroom with both shower and jet tub .
Washer and dryer in large storage room at back of apartment.
AC is provided by tenant if needed.
Porch and flower garden in front of home.
No smoking inside or out of any kind.
Parking on the street by permit.
Application fee with background check for 25$. Call seven 2 zero 4,9,6 nine two 5 7.
